summary: An Ordinance of The City of Seattle approving the execution by the Mayor and City Comptroller and ex-officio City Clerk of the City of Seattle, and ratifying and confirming, a certain agreement between, the City of Puget Sound Traction, Light & Power Company authorizing the City to construct a footbridge on the north side of the Ravenna Park trestle of the Company, on the terms and conditions specified in such contract, and indemnifying the Company, its successors and assigns, from all loss, damage, cost and expense incident to the construction, maintenance and use of such foot-bridge.
